name: Schulwerkzeug
short_description:
Schulwerkzeug is meant to become what is required by schools to manage their daily businesses. Furthermore, it strives to provide teachers and educational staff with the means to produce reports, school reports, marks and such things. In order to fit the needs of individual schools the system will be highly configurable.

Schulwerkzeug is an open source project and as such it will hopefully help a lot of people for free. If you think, however, that this project is worth a donation, please feel free to do so by clicking on my account link. Then you can leave a donation to buy me a beer and/or tremendously help pushing this project forward.

Help through testing and helpful commenting or even coding is also warmly welcome. If you'd like to join the project feel free to contact me.
summary: Tool to administrate pupils, marks, reports and more.
